Ragnar had not seen the attack coming. In fact, he realized just then 
they had cloaking abilities. The harpoon exploded on his thigh but 
hardly did more than to shed some armor off. He swung his autocannon 
in line with the newly appeared Riekan and let go a double shot along 
with his two large lasers.

Ragnar: Maximals! They have more troops coming in, but these have 
cloaking devices! Be careful!

On the other side of the battlefield, Katya barely escaped the 
tentacles of the pumpkin bot. Her speed did help her greatly and she 
soon was meters away from him. She aimed at the two nearest appendages 
and tried to fry them.

Katya: Stravag! Katya to Ragnar and Rodimus, I am being engaged. The 
hit-and-run will have to wait a bit.

Blackfang: Katya, I'm coming to assist...

Katya: Neg! He is mine! Distract the others.

Blackfang saw the fake Optimus and fired his shotgun on him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Ragnar's only warning that he has a much closer opponent than 
> Hydras's group is the distinctive "k'thunk" sound of Riekan's gun 
> launching and explosive harpoon.  The shot forces him to decloak, 
but 
> he retains most of the element of surprise.
